definition: hot patching (of insulating material in a furnace)/hot patching (runtime correction in computing)
to warm up/to heat up/hot (of weather)/heat/fervent
to repair/to patch/to mend/to make up for/to fill (a vacancy)/to supplement

sentences.english: Some precision gages used a thermal compensator.
sentences.chinese: 有些精密儀器用了熱補償器。
